[COLOR lightblue]Sabado 19:00 hrs [/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue][COLOR yellow]Colombia[/COLOR] vs [COLOR white]EEUU[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray][I] canal13 chile [/I] [/COLOR]

regex.name: rtmp
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,): import re, requests, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0', 'Referer': 'http://www.chilenext.com/'} source = requests.get('http://shidurlive.com/embed/canal13hd1b', headers=headers) embed = re.findall('src=\"(.*?)\"', source.text)[0] source2 = requests.get(embed, headers=headers) file = re.search('unescape\(\'(.*?)\'.*\n.*streamer.*(rtmp.*?)\'', source2.text) rtmp = file.group(2) + '/' + urllib.unquote(file.group(1)) return rtmp
